name: Bluegrass
description: Born in the Appalachian region of the United States during the late 1930s, characterized by fingerpicked banjo along with other traditional instruments.

children.name: Progressive Bluegrass
children.description: Modernization with varied influences including Jazz, Folk, Rock, and other forms of Country.

children.name: Traditional Bluegrass
children.description: Driving tempos, acoustic stringed instrumentation, and high vocal harmonies, adhering to the stylistic roots of the Bluegrass genre.
